altTitles.ja: はかないフリートガールズ

description.en:
Part of the [Kantai Collection](https://mangadex.com/?page=search&title=Kantai%20Collection) franchise.  
It's your average Kantai Collection Doujinshi about life on base, except somebody has stolen all the underwear on base. Now these nautical harlots must make the best of their situation.  
  
Technically safe for work in the same way that a PopTart is technically a sandwich.
